snippet: The oil spill settlement is further evidence that BP is willing to pay serious money to atone for its errors. Now BP has to meet its obligations to the environment.
abstract: Editorial welcomes proposed multibillion-dollar settlement between BP and individuals and businesses hurt by the 2010 oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico but urges company to also meet its obligations in other pending suits; holds the Justice Dept must push hard to settle federal claims for environmental damages and Congress must ensure funds are used to restore the gulf's fragile ecosystem.
lead_paragraph: The oil spill settlement is further evidence that BP is willing to pay serious money to atone for its errors. Now BP has to meet its obligations to the environment.
